rules_01__ai_run_template_prd_template_m.text: User Name/ID
Introduction and Objectives
Document Purpose
Project Idea & Core Problem (User Input)
Product Vision (AI to Propose, User to Validate)
Business Goals (AI to Propose based on Idea, User to Validate)
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) (AI to Propose, User to Validate)
Project Scope (AI to Propose based on Features, User to Validate)
Out of Scope (AI to Propose, User to Validate)
Guiding Principles for the AI Agent
Agentic Coding System Overview
Default Technology Stack & AI Initiative in Tooling
Access to Project Context for AI Agent
AI-Human Interaction and Validation Protocol
Market and User Analysis (AI to Assist/Research if Instructed)

Problem(s) to Solve (Elaborated by AI from User Input)
Target Audience (AI to Propose, User to Validate)
User Personas (AI to Generate Drafts, User to Validate)
Competitive Analysis (Optional User Input / AI Research Task)
Unique Value Proposition (UVP) (AI to Propose, User to Validate)
Functional Requirements (User Input & AI Elaboration)
High-Level Feature List (User Input)
User Stories (AI to Generate from Features, User to Validate)
Use Cases (AI to Generate for Complex Features, User to Validate)
User Flows (AI to Propose, User to Validate)
Localization and Internationalization (L10n / I18n) Requirements (AI to Query User if Potentially Needed)
Preliminary API Design (AI to Propose if applicable, User to Validate)
Non-Functional Requirements (NFRs) (AI to Propose Defaults, User to Adjust)
Performance
Scalability
Security
Reliability and Availability
Maintainability

Compatibility (Browsers, Devices, OS)

Design and Architecture (AI to Propose, User to Validate)

Core UI Components List (AI to Propose Initial List)
Interaction Design Principles (AI to Propose Key Principles)
Accessibility (A11Y) Specific Targets (AI to Propose)
Proposed System Architecture (AI to Generate)
Technology Stack (User Override / Confirmation of Defaults)
Data Requirements (AI to Propose Model based on Features)
Third-Party Integrations & MCP Servers (AI to Propose Solutions based on Needs)
Known and Desired MCP Catalog
Directory Structure and Naming Conventions (AI to Adhere to Defaults)

Test and Validation Plan (AI to Propose, User to Validate)
Test Strategy (Including AI Generation)

Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin/BDD Format - AI to Generate)
Detailed Test Scenarios for AI Agent (AI to Generate)
User Acceptance Testing (UAT) (User to Define Process)
Performance, Security, etc. Tests (Criteria for AI - AI to Propose)
Deployment and Launch Plan (AI to Propose, User to Validate)
Deployment Strategy
Deployment Prerequisites
Deployment Scripts (Instructions for AI Agent)
Rollback Plan
Launch Communication
Maintenance and Future Evolutions (User Input & AI Suggestions)
Maintenance Plan (AI to Propose Basics)
Ideas for Future Releases (User Input / AI Brainstorming)
AI Agent Specific Instructions
Feature Decomposition and Specification Process (Mandatory Pre-Coding Step for AI)
Coding Style and Linters
Dependency Management
Code Documentation Generation
Commit and Versioning Strategy
Feedback Loop and Self-Correction
AI Initiative in Tooling, MCP Server, and Service Selection
Protocol for Proposing and Learning New Tools/MCPs
Workflow with Assisted Coding Tools (e.g., Cursor, Cline)
Standard MCP Integration Logic (Using Supabase as a Hub)
Risks and Dependencies (AI to Identify, User to Validate)
Risk Identification
Risk Mitigation Plan
Dependencies
Glossary (AI to Maintain)
Appendices (User or AI to Add as Needed)
